descriptions: Fails to identify any hazards or incorrectly identifies most hazards on common household product labels.
Identifies very few hazards on common household product labels and/or misinterprets their meaning.
Identifies some hazards on common household product labels but misses key warnings or misinterprets a few.
Identifies most hazards on common household product labels with minor omissions or slight misinterpretations.
Accurately identifies nearly all hazards on common household product labels.
Consistently and accurately identifies all hazards and potential dangers on common household product labels with a comprehensive understanding.
Does not understand or follow safe use instructions provided on the labels; demonstrates unsafe practices.
Shows limited understanding of safe use instructions and is unable to apply them correctly.
Understands some safe use instructions but struggles to apply them in practical scenarios.
Generally understands and follows safe use instructions with occasional errors or omissions.
Clearly understands and correctly applies safe use instructions in almost all situations.
Demonstrates a complete understanding of safe use instructions and consistently applies them with precision and care.
Is unaware of or ignores proper storage guidelines for household products.
Has minimal knowledge of proper storage and does not follow recommended practices.
Knows some storage guidelines but inconsistently applies them or makes errors.
Generally follows proper storage procedures with minor lapses or uncertainties.
Consistently follows proper storage procedures, ensuring safety and preventing accidents.
Exhibits expert knowledge of proper storage procedures and proactively implements them to maximize safety and minimize risks.
Is unaware of correct disposal methods and/or disposes of products improperly, posing environmental risks.
Demonstrates little awareness of correct disposal and struggles to follow appropriate guidelines.
Knows some correct disposal methods but makes errors or omissions in their application.
Generally follows correct disposal methods with minor exceptions or uncertainties.
Consistently follows correct disposal methods, minimizing environmental impact and ensuring safety.
Demonstrates extensive knowledge of correct disposal methods and advocates for responsible waste management practices.
